channel.title: cleaning on Ethnic HomeLand In Africa
channel.description: Recent content in cleaning on Ethnic HomeLand In Africa

item.title: 3. Cleaning Procedure
item.description: As both Murdock and GREG geo-databases were manually recovered from historical maps, many measurement errors might exist due to the geo-referencing process. For instance: (i) polygons borders could be miss-located due to manual process, (ii) There must be complex geometries that cannot be intersect with other polygons, among others.
